Package org.micromanager.events

Interface EventManager

  • public interface EventManager
    This interface provides access to the application-wide EventBus, on which the events in the org.micromanager.events package are posted.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void post​(java.lang.Object event)
      Post an event on the EventBus, so that subscribers for that event can be notified.
      void registerForEvents​(java.lang.Object obj)
      Register the specified object to receive events.
      void unregisterForEvents​(java.lang.Object obj)
      Un-register the provided object from the EventBus, so that it will no longer receive event notifications.

    • Method Detail

      • registerForEvents

        void registerForEvents​(java.lang.Object obj)
        Register the specified object to receive events. Any public void methods in the object that a) are marked with a @Subscribe annotation, and b) take a single event from the org.micromanager.events package as their only argument will be invoked with the appropriate event object when those events occur.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object that should be subscribed to receive event notifications.

      • unregisterForEvents

        void unregisterForEvents​(java.lang.Object obj)
        Un-register the provided object from the EventBus, so that it will no longer receive event notifications. You should make certain to do this when objects are disposed of (e.g. if they are attached to a window that is being closed). Failure to do so can result in errors when the event is published to an invalid object.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object that should no longer receive event notifications.

      • post

        void post​(java.lang.Object event)
        Post an event on the EventBus, so that subscribers for that event can be notified.
        Parameters:
        event - The event object to be posted.
